I’ll lower the ask to a ratio where the brick-per-ore price is right at the line they just refused:

Ask 4 Brick for 3 Ore → 4 × 26 = 104 for 3 × 36 = 108. My value rises by 4.

I also have an abundance of Sheep (17 units), but I don’t need more of anything except Ore. I’ll keep Sheep offers at “3 Sheep for 1 Ore” or better; they’ve rejected once, so I’ll pause that line for the moment.

So, proposal:

[Offer: 2 Brick -> 1 Ore]
